descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**99 DROPS** is a brutal VR parkour challenge where dropping isn’t failing — it’s how you get better.
Jump risky gaps, balance on narrow platforms, and try not to drop into the lasers below.
One bad move, and down you go. But every drop sharpens your skills.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[media]
# Missed the jump? So what.
Try, fail, repeat — that's the game.

[media]
# Each spotlight reveals a new trial.
How far can you go before you break?

[media]
# Careful or reckless — your choice.
There's no wrong way to conquer the course.
